SELECT 'Project-Task' as type, m_prj_project.id AS projectId, m_prj_project.name AS projectName, m_prj_task.taskname AS summary, m_prj_task.assignUser AS assignUser, concat(s_user.firstname, ' ', LTRIM(concat(IFNULL(s_user.middlename, ''), ' ')), s_user.lastname) as assignUserFullName, s_user.avatarId AS assignUserAvatarId, m_monitor_item.monitor_date AS monitorDate, m_prj_task.id AS typeId, m_prj_task.deadline AS dueDate, m_prj_task.status AS status
FROM m_monitor_item INNER JOIN m_prj_task ON (m_monitor_item.type='Project-Task' AND m_monitor_item.typeid=m_prj_task.id) INNER JOIN m_prj_project ON (m_prj_project.id=m_monitor_item.extraTypeId) INNER JOIN s_user ON (s_user.username=m_prj_task.assignUser)
